title: Only 99.9% Can SOLVE this - Brain It On

7:06 for any1 wondering, the optical illusion Felix is talking about is at each of the cross sections of the white blocks, you can see little grey circles that fade in and out. Just try looking at the cross sections, but not too hard, and you will see it too :)

I have an annual reminder on April 29th every year labeled pewds anniversary. I don’t really watch pewds anymore, and I don’t remember what it’s for, whether it’s whenever Felix created his channel or when I subscribed, but it’s brought me back here once again.
I forgot just how nice it was getting to watch these kinds of videos he posts

Brain It On has been out for a really long time, like many years - honestly it is the best puzzle game ever made.
I 3-starred all 300 levels, love it so much.
Once you get into the hundreds levels, they start to get quite tough. There are also tons of user created levels and daily challenge levels
I always love how Felix never fails to make the most simple of games entertaining to watch!
